tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    task_description TEXT,
    estimated_duration INT,
    start_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceRecord (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drone_id INT,
  task_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  completion_status VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES Drone(drone_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES MaintenanceTask(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Drones ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    drone_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    production_date DATE NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS MaintenanceRecords ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    drone_id INT NOT NULL, 
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    maintenance_description TEXT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES Drones(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Tasks ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    task_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
    due_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    completion_status BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE, 
    drone_id INT NOT NULL, 
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES Drones(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE drones (
    drone_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    next_maintenance_date DATE,
    status ENUM('operational', 'maintenance', 'out_of_service')
);

CREATE TABLE assigned_tasks (
    assignment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id UUID REFERENCES maintenance_tasks(task_id),
    drone_id UUID REFERENCES drones(drone_id),
    assigned_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE,
    status ENUM('pending', 'completed')
);
